item.description:
Please contact Jon Tomlin in our Members section if you have any other questions.

Jon is the Organizer for Book Lovers & Coffee Enthusiast.

Jons description of this event.

Hi Book Groupies,

Look forward to seeing everyone in April. I am very excited about our selection this month.
It is New Earth by Eckhart Tolle. I am knee deep into reading it and it is very fascinating and
should make for a great conversation piece.

Read what Amazon has to say:

"With his bestselling spiritual guide The Power of Now, Eckhart Tolle inspired millions of readers
to discover the freedom and joy of a life lived "in the now."
In A New Earth, Tolle expands on these powerful ideas to show how transcending
our ego-based state of consciousness is not only essential to personal happiness,
but also the key to ending conflict and suffering throughout the world.
Tolle describes how our attachment to the ego creates the dysfunction that leads to anger, jealousy,
and unhappiness, and shows readers how to awaken to a new state of consciousness and
follow the path to a truly fulfilling existence"

http://bookclub.meetu...

bookclub.meetup.com/1037/calendar/7440644/


A New Earth

http://eckharttolle.c...

eckharttolle.com/a_new_earth

In answer to some inquiries regarding this Meet Up...
I do not think that there will be a "chat" regarding this book.

I am considering rescheduling another discussion for this book for
Later on this summer so that more members can have time to read this
Book and discuss it.

Some member of our group are showing an interest in this book
But cannot attend an early April Meet Up.

Look to around August or September where I will move a discussion
Of this book to North Haven that is more central to most of
Our members.

Mike B
item.how_to_find_us: Jon Tomlin is the POC/Org for this Event. B & N Cafe is small enough so I am sure that you can find the group.
item.why: You will be at a Book Store that is next to a Mall and many other stores. How can you not show up?
item.name: Coffee Talk has a Cup Browsing A New Earth
